resources.string: Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Select a recipient for your message.
You must install WhatsApp to use WhatsCloud!
An error occurred while registering your device for push notifications.\n\nPlease try again later.
\n\nPlease contact us at whatscloudapp@gmail.com and we will help you fix this.
Click here to reset your password if you forgot it.
Existing users, click here to sign in
Your password does not match the password confirmation!
Please download and install WhatsApp before using WhatsCloud.
In order to use WhatsCloud, you must grant permanent root access to WhatsCloud in the next screen.
You are now ready to use WhatsCloud on your computer or tablet!\n\nGo to https://whatscloud.io/ to get started.
WhatsCloud needs root access to sync\nyour chats to your computer or tablet
Please enter your email address to reset your WhatsCloud account password.
A verification code has been sent to your email. Please enter it to reset your password.
Please enter a new password for your account.
Your password has been changed successfully.
Existing users, click here to sign in
Please enter both your email and password.
Please enter your email and password, twice.
To sign up for WhatsCloud, you must enter your email address and choose a strong password.
You will use these credentials to access your chats online from your computer or tablet device.
To sign in to WhatsCloud, enter the account email address and password that you signed up with.
An error occurred while encrypting your data. Please contact us at whatscloudapp@gmail.com to get help.
